title: Akudama Drive
synopsis: The bustling metropolis of Kansai, where cybernetic screens litter the neon landscape, may seem like a technological utopia at first glance. But in the dark alleys around the brightly-lit buildings, an unforgiving criminal underbelly still exists in the form of fugitives known as "Akudama."
characters: ['Cutthroat', 'Ordinary Person', 'Courier', 'Hacker', 'Brawler', 'Doctor', 'Hoodlum', 'Execution Division Master', 'Execution Division Apprentice', 'Black Cat']
voices: ['Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Kurosawa, Tomoyo', 'Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Horie, Shun', 'Takeuchi, Shunsuke', 'Ogata, Megumi', 'Kimura, Subaru', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Hanamori, Yumiri', 'Uchida, Maaya']
